---
category: news
title: "AMD launches Radeon RX 7600 XT GPU with Fluid Motion Frames Technology"
excerpt: "AMD compares the performance of the Radeon RX 7600 XT GPU with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 and claims to offer 1.9x faster gaming and raytracing performance. The graphics card does support all the latest Radeon software technologies such as AMD Fluid Motion Frames (AFMF), which generates additional frames to make the game look smoother."
